Soy Desarrollador de Software y estoy cu:
I am a Software Developer and I am completing the final stages of my degree in Computer Science at the National University of Patagonia San Juan Bosco, located in Puerto Madryn.

I currently hold the title of University Programming Analyst, and I am just one exam away from obtaining the degree of Bachelor in Computer Science.

This space reflects some of my projects and experiences in the fascinating world of computing. If you want to know more about it, feel free to contact me!
